tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE leadership_roles (
  group_id INT,
  group_name STRING,
  leader_name STRING
)

CREATE TABLE group_members (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), group_name VARCHAR(255), role VARCHAR(255))
CREATE TABLE groups (id INT PRIMARY KEY, group_name VARCHAR(255), group_description TEXT)
CREATE TABLE leadership_roles (id INT PRIMARY KEY, role_name VARCHAR(255))
CREATE TABLE group_leaders (id INT PRIMARY KEY, group_id INT, leader_id INT, start_date DATE, end_date DATE)
CREATE TABLE GroupLeadership (id INT PRIMARY KEY, group_name VARCHAR(255), leader_name VARCHAR(255), leader_role VARCHAR(255))
CREATE TABLE GroupMembers (id INT PRIMARY KEY, group_name VARCHAR(255), member_name VARCHAR(255), member_role VARCHAR(255))
CREATE TABLE LeadershipRoles (id INT PRIMARY KEY, role_name VARCHAR(255))
CREATE TABLE GroupRepresentation (id INT PRIMARY KEY, group_name VARCHAR(255), leader_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (leader_id) REFERENCES GroupLeadership(id))
CREATE TABLE MemberRepresentation (id INT PRIMARY KEY, group_name VARCHAR(255), member_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (member_id) REFERENCES GroupMembers(id))
